text: Mark Farren (1 May 1982 - 3 February 2016) was an Irish footballer. He played as a forward for Derry City.Player Profile â€“ Official Derry City site Retrieved 23 August 2008 He was born in Donegal, Ireland. He played for Finn Harps F.C. from 2000 to 2001, Monaghan United F.C. from 2001 to 2003, Derry City F.C. from 2003 to 2012, and Glenavon F.C. from 2013 to 2014. Farren died on 3 February 2016 of cancer. He was aged 33. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in the Republic of Ireland Category:Irish footballers
title: Mark Farren
